item.name: Number of network interfaces
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

item.name: Device contact details
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device description
item.description: A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Device location
item.description: The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device name
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item_prototype.name: BGP Peer Admin Status {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the BGP connection. A transition from 'stop' to 'start' will cause the BGP Start Event to be generated. A transition from 'start' to 'stop' will cause the BGP Stop Event to be generated. This parameter can be used to restart BGP peer connections. Care should be used in providing write access to this object without adequate authentication. Es: stop(1), start(2)

item_prototype.name: BGP Peer Uptime {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: This timer indicates how long (in seconds) this peer has been in the Established state or how long since this peer was last in the Established state. It is set to zero when a new peer is configured or the router is booted.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap[.*BGP Peer State Changed.*.1.3.6.1.2.1.15.3.1.2.{#SNMPVALUE}:.*\.].str(:6.)}=0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap[.*BGP Peer State Changed.*.1.3.6.1.2.1.15.3.1.2.{#SNMPVALUE}:.*\.].str(:6.)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: BGP Peer {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: down)}=1) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: 2)}=1)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: up)}=1) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: 1)}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#SNMPVALUE} - {#IFALIAS}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHCInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} >= {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}*0.80) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHCOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} >= {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}*0.80)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHCInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} < {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}*0.80) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHCOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()} < {Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:ifHighSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}*0.80)
trigger_prototype.name: Traffic on {#SNMPVALUE} - {#IFALIAS}

dependency.name: Interface {#SNMPVALUE} - {#IFALIAS}
dependency.expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: down)}=1) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: 2)}=1)
dependency.recovery_expression: ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: up)}=1) or ({Template SNMP Device Huawei BGP:snmptrap["(.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3|.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4).*interface {#SNMPVALUE}\..*"].str(Operational state: 1)}=1)
